author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
summary: ...OCTAVE HOLDING STEADY WHILE HEADING EAST-SOUTHEASTWARD... As of 8:00 PM PDT Mon Oct 06 the center of Octave was located near 15.8, -120.4 with movement ESE at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 998 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...OCTAVE HOLDING STEADY WHILE HEADING EAST-SOUTHEASTWARD... As of 8:00 PM PDT Mon Oct 06 the center of Octave was located near 15.8, -120.4 with movement ESE at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 998 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Octave (EP5/EP152025)
